question: Which department has launched online 5G certification course for its officials?
option4: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade
explanation:
The Department of Telecommunications (DoT) has launched the online 5G certification course for its officials.
The Department aims to create an in-house pool of 5G experts and policymakers, by launching a 12-week online course, which will be conducted by National Telecommunications Institute for Policy Research, Innovation & Training (NTIPRIT), the training arm of the department.
